name: Shoulder Press, on Multi-Press
how_to_perform:
1. Stand facing a multi-press machine with the press arms at shoulder height.
 2. Place your shoulders against the pad and grip the arm handles firmly.
 3. Squeeze your lats and push your feet against the ground for stability.
4. Press the weights straight up over your head, extending your arms fully.
5. Lower the weights back to the starting position, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: The shoulder press on a multi-press is an upper body exercise that targets the shoulders and can be performed using a multi-press machine.
